name: The Frozen Garden
description:
THE FROZEN GARDEN


The Frozen Garden is a third-person horror game inspired by classic survival horror.
Explore an intriguing world, where environments blend with light, darkness, and desolation. The atmospheric lighting contributes to creating an eerie atmosphere of melancholy, while the soundtrack alternates between sadness and fear.



Take on the role of a solitary protagonist who finds himself in a desolate garden, enveloped in a wintry aura of sadness. Despite everything being dead and frozen, the protagonist refuses to accept the grim reality and is determined to keep the garden alive. As you explore the garden, you will make a discovery that reveals a sorrowful truth...

Flee from terrifying encounters, as only your willpower and determination will lead you to the truth.

Prepare yourself for a creepy and engaging experience as you delve into the icy garden. Will you be able to uncover the dark secrets of the garden and confront the demons that torment it?
